title: Definition of Managed Objects for IPv6 over Low-Power Wireless Personal Area Networks (6LoWPANs)
source: IPv6 over Networks of Resource-constrained Nodes
abstract:
This document defines a portion of the Management Information Base
(MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet
community.  In particular, it defines objects for managing IPv6 over
Low-Power Wireless Personal Area Networks (6LoWPANs).
